Springfield.Area code 937:
Area code 937 is a telephone area code serving much of the southwestern part of the U.S. state of Ohio and was established September 28, 1996.


== History ==
Area code 937 covers Bellefontaine, Dayton, Fairborn, Hillsboro, Marysville, Springfield, Wilmington, Xenia, public parts of Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, and areas north and east of Cincinnati. It split from area code 513 in 1996.
